images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Тайланд in autumn, showcasing beautiful sunsets, fresh fruits, and serene beaches.
AI-selected This image will highlight autumn experiences in Тайланд, showcasing wellness activities like Thai massage and local festivals.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users through the content and facilitating ticket purchasing.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users through the content and facilitating ticket purchasing.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users through the content and facilitating ticket purchasing.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to establish brand identity and recognition.
AI-selected This pattern will serve as a background element, enhancing the overall visual appeal of the email.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of Thailand showcasing beaches, sunsets, and tropical fruits, emphasizing the beauty of autumn travel.

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight autumn activities and experiences in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of autumn festivals, fresh fruits, and wellness activities like Thai massage.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Тайланд: осенние приключения ждут!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Тайланд in autumn, showcasing beautiful sunsets, fresh fruits, and serene beaches.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
